work_description: Addition/remodel; new windows, new siding, new roofing includes adding roof overhang where none exist. Kitchen renovation, lighting and appliances. 2nd floor bathrm renovation, replace all finishes, all plumbing to remain at current location. Convert existing bedrm into bathrm, add water-wastewater, rework electrical, add shower stall vanity, upgrade 2nd floor door and base boards. Addition to kitchen from garage area.
